translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、なんだかんだ皆ヘロヘロだからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, everyone's pretty worn out one way or another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どいつもこいつもよく頑張ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each and every one of them did their best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、ですがその分、気は充実している」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but because of that, our spirit is full and strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお！　遂にやってきた反撃の時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh! The time for our counterattack has finally come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンの志士、ここにあり！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The loyal warriors of Helman stand here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってところを見せつけたくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re itching to show everyone that fact,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズウズしてやがるぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we can't wait any longer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……俺のことでもあるがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...And that includes me as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、ではそろそろ行きましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, then, shall we get going soon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスが後ろに振り返り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos turned around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幅広のヘルマンソードを天に掲げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and held his broad Helman sword high toward the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスの目の前には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of Amitos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒金-ｸﾛｶﾞﾈ-の騎士が大量に並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large number of Kurogane knights stood in formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆の者！　時は来た！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone! The time has come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我ら誇り高きヘルマン軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We, the proud Helman army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで屈辱と辛苦に耐え続けてきた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have endured humiliation and hardship until now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々は友を殺され、女を犯され、国を汚された！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our friends were killed, our women violated, and our country defiled!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雪辱を晴らす権利はここにいる皆にある！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each of us here has the right to avenge these humiliations!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「積年の恨みを晴らすは今！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to clear years of grudges!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同胞-ﾊﾗｶﾗ-の無念を晴らすは今だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to avenge our comrades' unresolved grievances!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスの言葉、身振りに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By Amitos's words and gestures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士と兵士の垣根もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without distinction between knights and soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、目に爛々と炎が灯り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a fiery light ignited brightly in everyone’s eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日頃の連戦に疲れ切った兵の総身に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bodies of soldiers worn out by continuous battles

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活力が満ち、血が滾っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: filled with newfound vigor, their blood boiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「野郎共！　今まで悪かったな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Men! I'm sorry for how things have been until now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 似合わねぇ我慢を強いてきた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I forced you to endure things that didn’t suit you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今！　その鬱憤を存分にブツける時が来た！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now! The time has come to vent all that frustration fully!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 祖国を汚すクズ、一掃の時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time to wipe out the scum who defile our homeland!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺らの剣は死んでいった奴らの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our swords are the anger of those who have died!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺された民の怒りだと思え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Think of them as the wrath of the slaughtered people!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「剣を握れ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grip your swords!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りを奮い立たせろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stir up your anger!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵は目の前だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy is right before us!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぅっと、ロレックスが一度息を吸う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex took a steady breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃ィィィーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chargeeeeeeee!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オオォォオォーーーーーーーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oooooooohhhhhhhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒ、ヒィーーー！　来た！　来たーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-hiiii! They're coming! They're coming!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒い大津波。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A massive black tsunami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の黒金の騎士達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A great number of Kurogane knights

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一斉に魔軍に突撃を仕掛ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all launched a charge against the demon army at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これに対抗出来るだけの士気は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army lacked the morale to counter this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在の魔軍にはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in their current state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 領地を次々と取り戻していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the territories were being reclaimed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍事大国、鉄と石の国、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The military powerhouse, the land of iron and stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの面目躍如であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman’s reputation was upheld gloriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは今滅亡の危機の中にあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman was now in the midst of a crisis of extinction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔人二体を倒しはしたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though Rance had defeated two demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで戦況が覆るほど、魔軍の兵数は少なくない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army still had enough troops that the tide of battle would not turn from just that.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへっ、なんだかんだ皆ヘロヘロだからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, everyone's pretty worn out one way or another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どいつもこいつもよく頑張ったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each and every one of them did their best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、ですがその分、気は充実している」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, but because of that, our spirit is full and strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお！　遂にやってきた反撃の時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh! The time for our counterattack has finally come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンの志士、ここにあり！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The loyal warriors of Helman stand here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってところを見せつけたくて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re itching to show everyone that fact,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズウズしてやがるぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we can't wait any longer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……俺のことでもあるがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...And that includes me as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、ではそろそろ行きましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, then, shall we get going soon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスが後ろに振り返り、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幅広のヘルマンソードを天に掲げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and held his broad Helman sword high toward the sky.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of Amitos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒金-ｸﾛｶﾞﾈ-の騎士が大量に並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a large number of Kurogane knights stood in formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆の者！　時は来た！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone! The time has come!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我ら誇り高きヘルマン軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We, the proud Helman army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで屈辱と辛苦に耐え続けてきた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have endured humiliation and hardship until now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々は友を殺され、女を犯され、国を汚された！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our friends were killed, our women violated, and our country defiled!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雪辱を晴らす権利はここにいる皆にある！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each of us here has the right to avenge these humiliations!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「積年の恨みを晴らすは今！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to clear years of grudges!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同胞-ﾊﾗｶﾗ-の無念を晴らすは今だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now is the time to avenge our comrades' unresolved grievances!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスの言葉、身振りに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By Amitos's words and gestures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士と兵士の垣根もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without distinction between knights and soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、目に爛々と炎が灯り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a fiery light ignited brightly in everyone’s eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日頃の連戦に疲れ切った兵の総身に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bodies of soldiers worn out by continuous battles

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活力が満ち、血が滾っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: filled with newfound vigor, their blood boiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「野郎共！　今まで悪かったな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Men! I'm sorry for how things have been until now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 似合わねぇ我慢を強いてきた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I forced you to endure things that didn’t suit you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今！　その鬱憤を存分にブツける時が来た！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now! The time has come to vent all that frustration fully!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 祖国を汚すクズ、一掃の時だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time to wipe out the scum who defile our homeland!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺らの剣は死んでいった奴らの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our swords are the anger of those who have died!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺された民の怒りだと思え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Think of them as the wrath of the slaughtered people!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「剣を握れ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grip your swords!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りを奮い立たせろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stir up your anger!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵は目の前だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy is right before us!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぅっと、ロレックスが一度息を吸う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex took a steady breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃ィィィーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chargeeeeeeee!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オオォォオォーーーーーーーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oooooooohhhhhhhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒ、ヒィーーー！　来た！　来たーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-hiiii! They're coming! They're coming!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒い大津波。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A massive black tsunami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の黒金の騎士達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A great number of Kurogane knights

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一斉に魔軍に突撃を仕掛ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all launched a charge against the demon army at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これに対抗出来るだけの士気は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army lacked the morale to counter this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在の魔軍にはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in their current state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 領地を次々と取り戻していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the territories were being reclaimed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍事大国、鉄と石の国、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The military powerhouse, the land of iron and stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの面目躍如であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman’s reputation was upheld gloriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは今滅亡の危機の中にあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman was now in the midst of a crisis of extinction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔人二体を倒しはしたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though Rance had defeated two demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで戦況が覆るほど、魔軍の兵数は少なくない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army still had enough troops that the tide of battle would not turn from just that.
